title: Shooting - 8XX CALVERT ST, DETROIT, MI
content:
Google Streetview Disclaimer: This is a Google Maps Street View of the approximate area where the crime occurred. It is not necessarily the exact address view of the crime.
Shooting/Stabbing. U/D: PD now states this was a triple shooting. All were transported to the hospital.
800 BLOCK OF CALVERT ST, Detroit, MI US
